gpt_comment: ⚠️[DIVERGENT] Meteoblue reports slightly different weather conditions for Brussels. Meteoblue predicts 0.1-0.2" of rain, whereas the baseline forecast shows 57% chance of rain. With these differing forecasts, it sounds like a classic day of uncertainty in Brussels - might want to bring an umbrella just in case, unless you'd prefer to dance in the rain like a gazelle.
